attributes.action: Make an announcement on national TV that he is too busy to waste his time looking at a bunch of off-the-peg petitions from single-issue timewasters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The script should read, "Hello, I am Tony Blair, I have a country to run.  I do not care about your shed, or your local football team, or the rules of cricket, or your racist right-wing beliefs.  I have better things to do.  Go call the Jeremy Vine show instead."

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
